name: Target Practice (itch) (def !willy)
description:
Assets Used:

Breaking Png vectors by Lovepik.com

Music by David Renda on fesliyanstudios

M16A2 and M45A1 by "not cpl. Kerry#5019" on Discord

Gold Trophy by "mergimii" on cgtrader

Controls:

WASD: Move the player

Move Mouse: Look around

LMB: Shoot when the gun is equipped

R: Reload the gun when the gut is equipped

E: Pick up the nearest gun

Q: Drop the gun

ESC:  Go to the main menu

Left CTRL + T: Restart level
